alert.note: Alert for Christian; Greene; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 9:08PM CDT until September 23 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Webster County in southwestern Missouri... Northeastern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... Greene County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 907 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pleasant Hope to near Strafford to Springfield to 7 miles northwest of Republic, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. This line of storms has a history of downing trees and power lines. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springfield, Nixa, Ozark, Republic, Marshfield, Battlefield, Willard, Rogersville, Strafford, Seymour, Sparta, Fair Grove, Highlandville, Fremont Hills, Fordland, Niangua, Brookline, Diggins, Elkland and Glidewell. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 62 and 108. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
